inn1.comm: length ball which is driven to mid-on for none
defended off the front foot to the off side
short on middle and leg and pulled to midwicket
full, flat, and flicked to backward square leg for a boundary
short and wide outside off. Batsman not keen to offer a stroke
full on off stump and gets a thickish edge onto the pads
angling in on middle and leg. Flicked to fine leg for a single
defended to the off side
hits this one uppishly behind square for a single
back of a length and pushed to the off side
fuller this time from McClenaghan as this is driven to mid-off
full again from McClenaghan as this is driven to short extra-cover, with Guptill making a fine diving stop
full on middle as this is lofted airily through mid-off, with the fielder making a dive for it but not able to quite get close to it. In the end the ball travels for six
full again as Powell looks to get this away through the off side
length ball which sits up on leg as Powell swivels on the back foot to pull this behind square on the leg side for four
rushes this one just outside off as Powell goes for a loose stroke to one which nips in from back of a length
length ball just outside off which is left alone by the batsman
driven straight to mid-off for a single as West Indies are on a roll early on here in Hamilton
length ball coming in on middle as Powell defends on the back foot
defends this one to the leg side
comes forward to push this one through covers
pulls this one down between long-on and midwicket for a boundary
on the back foot to this short of length offering from McClenaghan
just stands and delivers as this back of a length delivery is clobbered right back over the bowler's head for the second boundary in the over
gets him to edge this one away through the gap at third man for a boundary. West Indies simply on fire in these opening exchanges
back of a length which is looked to be chopped away to the off side
defends this one on the front foot to the off side
fuller one just on and around off as this is steered straight to point
back of length and just shaving off as this one bounces high to the keeper
overpitched from Southee as this is lofted down to midwicket for four. The West Indies seem to be practicing early for the T20s
Powell plays a magnificent shot off the back foot, this one punched through deep extra-cover for a wonderful boundary
fuller one just outside off which is nailed down the ground for yet another boundary. What a belter of a pitch!
overpitched from McClenaghan as Powell just careens this over midwicket, with a fellow in orange taking a good catch in the stands to win NZD $100,000
this time bowls it short, at 140 kph, as Powell goes for the pull, but doesn't get it away
too short from McClenaghan outside off as Powell ramps this over the vacant third man region for a boundary. Powell has been severe on anything loose this morning
short and pulled down to square leg for a single
drives this one down to long-on for a single
drives this one rather uppishly through the covers as Charles gets a couple
plays this one right back to the bowler
Charles looking to pummel this over cover. but instead gets it down to silly mid-on
plays this one right back to the bowler
full toss which is driven straight to mid-off, but can't pinch the run
overpitched from Anderson as Powell brings up his quickfire fifty, in just 28 balls, with a scintillating drive through extra-cover
full again as this time Powell finds long-off
overpitched on middle as Charles looks to squirt this away through point
too full from Anderson as Charles lasers this to cover
turns this one away off his hips to fine leg
length outside off which is left to the keeper
defends this one back to the bowler
clears the inner ring through the covers for a boundary
fuller one just outside off which is hit uppishly towards mid-off
looks to get this past the left of Nathan, but the bowler dives low to get to it
drives this fuller one through the off side to bring up another boundary
on the off side and driven down to mid-off for a single
delivers this one wide
glances this one behind to the keeper, and gets a leg-bye off the pad
defended with soft hands to the off side for a quick single
gets a long way across to try and work him down to fine leg. Anderson goes up for a shout as this strikes the pads, but looks like height may have been a factor
looks to go over the top but instead gets this through third man as this slides over the face of the fat
once again played with soft hands to find a single on the off side
length outside off which is allowed to rise through to the keeper
drives this down the ground to long-off for a single
works this one away to the leg side for one
drives this one away through extra-cover, hitting with the spin, as it finds the boundary
ends up playing this one right back to the bowler
looks to push this off the back foot, but Nathan dives to his left to get a hold of it
worked away down to long-on for one
plays this with soft hands to the off side to get a quick single. Too easy for West Indies at the moment
defends this one back to the bowler
turns this one off the pads, but backward square leg into play straightaway
works this off the back foot down to midwicket
angles this one away towards square leg for one
looks to club this one off the back foot through midwicket, but instead gets it down to long-on

and New Zealand strike as Powell looks to sweep a ball which is a bit too straight, getting hit flush on the right pad as the umpire doesn't hesitate to give this out. Ends a terrific innings from Powell, who smashes 73 off 44
plays this one straight back to the bowler
defends to the off side
gets this one away down to midwicket for a single
on the back foot as this is eased down to long-on
tries to get this one away square on the leg side, but the keeper is quickly on it to prevent the run
steers this one through point on the off side for one
length on off which is defended towards the bowler
defended on the front foot by Edwards
defends this length ball away to the off side
defended once more by Edwards
able to drive this fuller one down to sweeper cover
gets this one to shape away just outside off
on the front foot but steers this straight to point
back of length and edged away down to third man to bring up the 100 for the West Indies
back of a length and the ball catches the outside edge to spoon way over the infield to the boundary near third man for four. I still can't believe that went for four runs
plays a streaky shot which is fielded by third man
length shaping away on a length as Edwards shoulders arms
tries to get this one past point, but fails to do so
works this off the hips down to deep square leg
defended to the leg side
tries to get this away past short backwardd square
flicked off the pads down to deep square leg
works this one nicely in the gap through the covers for a couple
turns this one away behind square on the leg side for one
length outside off which is let through by gully to third man
too full on the pads as this is helped fine down to deep fine leg, who makes an excellent diving stop to prevent a certain boundary
drives this one through the covers, with Guptill diving at short cover point to get a finger on it
back of a length and shaping away as Charles has a flash
driven straight to short cover point to bring an end to the over
cuts this away off the back foot down to deep point
looks for the drive through the covers, but this one just nips away as the keeper collects
in the blockhole as Charles is able to dig this out
full and wide as Charles drives this down to deep extra-cover
another yorker which is dug out, this time by Edwards
driven over the bowler to long-off, but can't get a run
defended to the off side
defended again to the off side
pushes this one to the off side for a quick single, but hits it a bit too well as Nathan McCullum picks it up and throws down the non-striker's as Charles is well short of his crease
played to cover point with soft hands for a single
fuller ball which is worked away to midwicket for one
lofts this overpitched delivery straight over the bowler's head for a boundary. Quite a graceful shot that
yorker length which is blocked to cover point
tries to get this one away past the fielder at mid-on
driven towards the off side, but can't pinch a single
full again from Southee as Simmons looks to ease this away through fine leg
steered down to long-on for an easy single
full again as this one is worked to the off side, with Simmons going for the quick single. No one backing up the throw though as they run an overthrow to make it two
defended off the back foot towards the off side
driven straight to extra-cover
defended towards the off side as short cover point is all over this like white on rice
this one is worked away to deep point as the pair walk a single
strikes him outside the line as Charles gives the charge. Mills goes up for an appeal, but the umpire is not interested
pushes this one down towards long-off for one
steers this one off the back foot to the leg side for a quick single
flicked away by Edwards to find a boundary through square leg
punched back to the bowler off the back foot
glances this one off the back foot to square leg
defended away to the off side to bring an end to the over
pushed off the back foot towards point
able to pick up a single through the leg side
tries to work this away on the off side
on the back foot and defended away
sets off for a quick single through the off side, but the fielder picks it up quick to have a shy at the non-striker's. Simmons able to make it home in time though
worked off the back foot down to deep extra-cover
clips this through the deep midwicket region
full toss which is carved through the off side, but can't beat the fielder at cover
swinging ball going down the leg side. Called wide by the umpire
worked away to the off side for a single
Anderson gets Simmons to play uppishly to point as he goes for the cut. Looked more like a poke as he didn't seem to keep this down. Simmons is disappointed but he has to go
steered down to long-on for one
defended on the back foot by Bravo
looking to get this past the bowler, but N-Mac is equal to the task
eases this straight to square leg
once again played back to the bowler by Bravo
finally able to pierce the gap on the leg side to pinch the single
defended away to the leg side
full and swinging in on middle from Anderson
tries to cut this away through cover, but instead hits this to the leg side
defended solidly on the front foot by Bravo
shoulders arms to this length ball coming in
back of a length and pushed to backward square
steers this one to point for a single
defended back towards the bowler
Edwards on the front foot once more
steers this one down to sweeper cover to bring an end to the over

plays this with soft hands back to the bowler as the pair set off for a single. The batsman runs into Bravo, then the bowler, as Bravo's bat falls midway as he chugs it to the other end. Big smile on the Jamaican's face as we had a bit of a comedy of errors
this one going down the leg side as the umpire calls a wide
goes for a flash through the off side, but the ball gets some appreciable bounce on the way to the keeper
once again looks to play a ramp of sorts to this riser outside off
Bravo's first shot of aggression as he clears long-off to hit a mighty six
on the front foot as he plays this with soft hands for a single
plays a crunching drive off the back foot down to deep extra-cover
utilises the paddle flick to this leg side delivery to find the boundary
this time runs it down to short third man for a single
defends this one back to the bowler
steered down to long-off
on the back foot as this is punched to the off side
plays this one straight to extra-cover for a single
steered to mid-on for a tight single
drilled straight to short cover point
on middle and leg as Edwards fails to get this away
gets one to nip away just outside off to the keeper
full and on the pads as Edwards punishes McClenaghan with a flick through fine leg for four
steered away down to the leg side for a single
uses his feet to club this over the bowler's head fora boundary
defended on the front foot by Edwards
this time works it away to the leg side for one
once again played on the leg side to bring an end to the over
bowls a short delivery which climbs over the batsman's head
on the front foot and defended to the off side
able to work this away to the leg side for a single
on the front foot as this is defended away to the off side
on the back foot as this is timed down to midwicket. B-Mac is chasing this hard as it races across the outfield, but can't reign it in
looks for the pull but this one is pitched a bit too wide outside off
defended on the front foot to bring an end to the over
on the front foot as this is turned away to Guptill at silly mid-on
looks for an inside-out shot through the covers
pitching outside leg and hitting the pad as Williamson goes for an appeal. The umpire says not out, but Williamson wants the review. Deemed not out because it was pitching outside
shimmies down the track before finding deep midwicket
takes a single down the leg side
can't get a short ball away to the leg side
defended on the front foot to the off side
slower ball going down the leg side as Bravo has a swipe at it
defended away by Bravo
full and steered down to long-on
shuffles on the stumps and flicks to midwicket for a single
too full and Edwards plays an extravagant flick over midwicket to bring up a maiden ODI fifty
good yorker on middle and leg which is successfully dug out
full and going down the pads as this is clipped to fine leg for a boundary
defends this one away towards point
presses forward to keep this Williamson delivery out
ekes this one behind square on the leg side for one
worked away down to long-on for one
length outside off which is left alone by the batsman
worked away to the leg side
in the slot as this is hammered over midwicket for a one-bounce four
nudged down to long-on for a single
yorker on middle as this is hit straight to Guptill at short cover, who fires in a throw at the non-striker's
steered down to long-on for a single
Bravo stands outside leg as this one goes past his legs to be called a wide
goes for the extravagant loft over the covers, but fails to make a connection
works this one behind square on the leg side for one
hammers a flat six over extra-cover and long-off
paddles this one down to deep fine leg, with the fielder diving full stretch to stop a certain boundary
defended off the back foot to the leg side
steered through extra-cover by Bravo
drilled down the ground to long-off for a single
full again as this is hit towards mid-on
helped down to long-on for one more
drilled down to long-off
looks to run this one down to third man
plays a lofted sweep which carries all the way down to fine leg
drills one down to long-off
driven to long-off for a single
this time angles this one away to deep midwicket
paddle sweep to fine leg for one
in the blockhole once more as this is eked out to mid-off
full toss which is flicked straight to midwicket
length outside off which is played to sweeper cover
full and wide outside off which is steered straight to point
bowls one down the leg side. Called wide
another wide down the leg side
caresses this on the front foot through the covers with an exquisite drive
clears deep extra-cover with a loft as Edwards looks to accelerate. 250 up for the West Indies
fuller length ball played to silly mid-on, who has a crack at the non-strikers, but misses
able to dig this out as the ball flies through third man for a boundary
slower ball played with soft hands as the batsmen think about a run, before calling against it
on the back foot and clipped to deep fine leg for a boundary
back of a length and punched to point
Bravo able to flick this through midwicket for a boundary
able to find a boundary this time through third man to cap a successful over for WI
full on the pads as this is worked away to midwicket
yorker length which is dug out as the batsmen take a single
slower one which Edwards sees early as he slams this over long-off to go into the nineties
and gets to 96 with a streaky shot behind which just evades the keeper as he gets a finger on it. This one runs behind to the third man boundary
digs out a yorker on middle and leg
drives this full low toss down to long-on for a single and retain the strike
and with a fortuitous inside-edge which runs to the fine leg boundary Edwards finally gets that elusive maiden ODI century as he looks visibly relieved out there to get that monkey off his back
pushes this next one down to long-off for a single
Bravo bludgeons this over the square leg boundary for a six
this time delivers length on the off side which is sent behind square on the off side for a boundary
short and wide as Bravo clears his arms to help this over to deep point, who does well to dive and stop a boundary before the rope
back of a length which is ramped down to the third man boundary
full toss which is hit down to long-off
this time going down the pads as this is helped down to fine leg
full on middle and leg as this is clattered over midwicket for a huge six
fires one just outside off as Edwards fails to connect
in the slot as this is lasered through the covers for a splendid boundary
full toss on the pads which is worked down to fine leg
lets this one go outside off to the keeper
steers this one down to deep midwicket
sticks his bat out to guide this down to third man
defends this one back to the bowler
full again as this is worked away to the leg side
driven down to sweeper cover for a single
lofted down to long-on, but the fielder is too deep to get close to it as the ball just dies before Southee
gets this away down to long-off for one
tries to guide this through third man, but the fielder is up to the task
goes for the flick in the gap through midwicket, timing it well enough for it to reach the boundary
this time ease it behind square on the leg side as the ball is fielded just before the rope
keeps the strike with a single to the leg side
pushed down to long-off for a single
defended to the off side by Bravo
clipped down o deep midwicket fora boundary
gets a single as he moves to 97
clipped off the bat to square leg for a couple. Moves to 99 now
full, flat on the pads, flicked behind square for a single
fails to get this leg side delivery away

drive to long-on to bring up his 2nd ODI century. Took only 79 balls to get there as he has shown of late he can do it with the best of them. Gayle would have appreciated the violence of this knock towards the end
lofts this one straight down the ground fora huge six
ends up holing out to third man to end an entertaining knock
cuts this length ball away straight to point. Still go for the single as NMac has a shy at the stumps
third ball is run down to long-off for a single
hammers this one straight down to long-on
walks across the stumps in an attempt to flick through fine leg, but misses
bowls one wide outside off as Edwards tries to reach for it in vain
hits down the ground to long-off to finish the innings

inn2.comm: gets this one to shape away slightly on a length outside off
whips this back of a length delivery to the leg side to get New Zealand off the mark
length outside off which is driven straight to sweeper cover
works this once again the same area as they run a couple
Ryder goes after a back of length offering from Holder which travels almost to the deep fine leg before Russell makes a fine diving stop before the boundary
drives this towards sweeper cover as New Zealand score 9 off the first over
length ball which just gets a bit of away movement as it carries to the keeper
length outside off which is worked away to the packed off side
wide outside off, goes for a cut shot which gets a thick inside edge which falls near the slips behind
able to squirt this away through point, getting the fielder to misfield to allow for one
clips this off the pads to the leg side for a tap-and-run
defended back to the bowler
back of length which is defended by Ryder
Ryder simply clonks this back of a length delivery as this just bounces short of the midwicket rope
jabs this one straight to the cover fielder
change of pace as Ryder is early in his pull shot to this back of a length delivery
drives this one straight back towards long-on for four
Ryder ducks under a Holder bouncer, with the ball bouncing off his chest and going down towards fine leg for two runs
gets this one to nip in from a length as Guptill plays all around this one, leaving a wide gap between bat and pad. Bravo is sent off on a celebratory run as West Indies strike early in the piece
is on the front foot straightaway to this fuller one from Bravo
length outside off which is left well alone by the batsman
length outside off which is jabbed straight to backward point
shuffles over as he plays this one down to mid-on
length ball which sits up as Ryder hits this slightly uppishly past the bowler
gets this one to jag back slightly upon pitching outside off
driven straight back to the bowler
shuffles to the off side as Williamson runs this down to third man
back of a length which is cut away uppishly to third man
gets quickly into position before lofting this elegantly over deep midwicket for four
length outside off which is defended by Williamson
defended away to the off side by Ryder
full on the pads as this is helped down to fine leg
short and wide as this one is tailing away to the slips as Williamson slaps this back, almost to the hands of mid-on, with the ball dropping short
full toss going down the leg side which Williamson reaches out for to get a couple
short and wide as Williamson extends out to cut this away to sweeper cover
steps over to the off side in an attempt to paddle this over fine leg, but misses the ball
back of a length which is defended away to point
pulls this short one behind square on the leg side for a boundary
good length delivery on off, Williamson gets forward and defends it back
length delivery on middle and Williamson turns it to mid-wicket for a quick single
short ball which Ryder is enticed to have a go as he ends up spooning this one high over backward square, with Simmons getting under it to take a fine catch
gets a bit of away swing as this pitches full before deviating away
back of a length which is cut away to point
short and wide as Taylor has a flash, able to pinch the easy single as well
slower ball just outside off which is driven to short cover
able to get this away down to midwicket for a single
squares him up with a length ball which travels down to third man
fuller one just outside off which is fielded by short cover point
length outside off which gets a streaky edge down to third man
shortish length which is defended away to the off side. Able to sneak a run as well
turns this one away behind square on the leg side for a couple
back of a length again on middle and off, Taylor is quick to work it to mid-wicket for a single
traps him in front of the pads as the umpire confirms straightaway. Williamson consults Taylor, but decides to go and not go for the review
works this one down to extra-cover
driven straight back towards the bolwer
defended off the back foot towards the off side
length which is driven down to mid-off
cuts this away through point to get a single
back of a length which is looped up through point, but no fielders were in the vicinity, as this rolls harmlessly to sweeper cover
turns this one away to the leg side for one
on the back foot as this is parlayed towards deep point

gets this one to turn away on off as Taylor seems to have edged this behind to the keeper. Umpire straightaway gives it out, but Taylor shakes his head, not convinced, and goes for the review straightaway. Looks like there is nothing on HotSpot either. But snicko does show that there was a deflection off the edge, so this may very well be upheld. New Zealand four down and with still about 40 overs to go, and over 300 more to get
on the money as this is defended off the back foot
tries to play this away on the off side, but can't beat the infield
defended straight back to the bowler
gets two leg-byes off the pads
able to help this one along to deep fine leg
defended back to the bowler
gets this one away to the off side behind square
on the front foot and pushed towards short cover
turns one away to the leg side to find a single
pushed off the back foot to the leg side
strides forward to meet the pitch of the ball
once again defended off the back foot
cuts this one away through the off side for one
defended to the leg side
worked off the pads behind square on the leg side
defended away to short cover
strides forward to defend this one back to the bowler
turned away to deep midwicket for a single
worked away for a single to the leg side
clipped through midwicket to bring an end to the over
opens the face to run this down to third man
New Zealand are self-destructing in a big way as BMac gives the charge but hits this straight up, with Charles getting under it at mid-off to take a safe catch
pulled away by Anderson as this was a tad short from Miller. The new fastest centurion will have to relive Queenstown to get this close
punches this off the back foot to extra-cover
plays this one rather uppishly through the covers
defended back to the bowler by Ronchi
gets tall on him as he works this off the pads down to deep fine leg
back of a length and pulled away to midwicket fiercely by Anderson
spins away as Anderson cuts this away to sweeper cover for one
hits this uppishly straight to mid-off as the fielder fires in a throw at the non-striker's, but the batsman makes it in time
back of a length and played away to the off side
defended to the off side by Ronchi
gets deep in his crease before playing it back to the bowler
spears one in on the pads as Ronchi goes for the sweep, but finds backward square
defended on the front foot by Ronchi to bring the maiden over to an end
squirts this away through third man for a boundary, beating a diving gully fielder
drives this one straight down to long-off for a single
plays this one off the back foot down to long-on
cuts this one spinning away down to deep extra-cover
defended to the bowler by Ronchi
plays this one to midwicket to bring an end to the over
takes a single to the leg side
defends this one away to the off side
on the front foot as this is played down to Bravo at silly mid-off
drives this one down to mid-off for one
works this off the pads down to square leg, running hard enough to complete two
turned away to deep midwicket for one
short and wide as Anderson slams this down to mid-off

Russell gets Anderson to hit this straight up as this hits high on the blade as he goes for the pull. Bravo is able to get himself under it and take a relatively straightforward catch as the big wicket of Anderson departs for 29
back of a length which is worked off the hips to the leg side
gets this one to climb quite a bit as the umpire calls a wide
cuts this back of a length delivery away to deep extra-cover
fuller one which is drilled straight to mid-on
short and wide as Nathan is able to cut this away in the air behind point to find the boundary
plays this one back towards the bowler
off the back foot as this is worked down to long-on
guides this one through third man for one
gets this one to bounce a bit higher as Ronchi looks for the expansive drive through the covers
works this off the back foot down to long-on
steers this one straight to short cover point to bring the over to an end
gets an outside edge which flies to third man
plays a clever ramp to Russell to this one rearing back and onto him. Safe shot in the end as the ball falls just before the boundary
defends this back of a length slower ball uppishly as Russell goes in for a dive, but the ball is a bit too far away
short and wide and now Nathan directs this squarer through third man to find the boundary once more
driven to mid-off for a single
gets an outside edge to this length ball as it has enough on it for it to reach the boundary at third man
back of a length and played to the leg side for one
driven back to the bowler by Ronchi
steers this one down to long-on for one
cuts this one away outside off to deep extra-cover
back of a length and pulled in the air, falling short of the fielder stationed at long-on
once again pushed off the back foot as this is run down to the leg side for one

back of a length and nipping in as Nathan ends up feeding an edge to the keeper, who isn't going to miss out on this one, as Nathan is sent on his way. West Indies have seven, and New Zealand look to be simply going through the motions now
short ball on middle which Mills is equal to the task
short of a length and going down the leg side as Mills fends this one away behind square, beating short leg who was stationed quite close to it. Bravo thought they had their man there
defended solidly by Mills
gets this one to climb from a length as Mills thinks about the shot before continuing his swivel, with the keeper collecting from behind
full on the pads as Mills is able to steer this down to deep midwicket for a brace
gets this one away to the leg side
once again looks to get this through the leg side
defended to the off side by Mills
steers this one through the leg side with soft hands

hello? what has happened here? I see Ronchi stalking away and, oh my, now I see it, Ronchi, in an attempt to pull this, went too deep in his crease, hitting the bottom of the stumps with his right foot to go out in one of the more inglorious ways. That is a hitwicket from Ronchi, and one I haven't seen happen in quite a while. It seems today is the Windies' day after all.
short and going down the leg side as Mills glances this down to fine leg
too full as Southee lasers this through long-off for a boundary
short and going well down the leg side as Southee goes for a pull
once again short and heading down the leg side as Southee plays a half-hearted pull, which inside-edges onto the stomach, to pinch a single
delivers this one well down the leg side once more
on a length which is clipped off the pads down to fine leg
fuller one which is driven down to mid-on
plays this one away to deep midwicket for a single
this one sits up on a length as Mills plays this feebly behind square on the off side
clears the front leg and smashes this over midwicket for a huge six
defends this one carefully back towards the bowler

pitched up as Mills is enticed into a sweep, hitting this so hard at Russell, stationed at backward square, who can not hold on to a low chance to his right. Motions to the dressing room and players that he is in a bad way as he looks at his right hand, which had attempted the catch. Still on the field though
defended away to the leg side by Southee
turns this one away down to deep fine leg
defended by MIlls
attempts a reverse sweep which doesn't come off quite to Mills' plans
goes for the slog sweep as this one is hammered down to midwicket for a boundary
defended away to the off side to bring an end to the over
flights one outside off which is hit behind towards third man. Reined in by the fielder

and Southee's vigil comes to a non-descript end as he goes for the big shot once more, this time hitting way high over mid-off, with that man, Dwayne Bravo, once again in the thick of it as he gets under the catch. Just one wicket away now, West Indies, from squaring the series
gets him to play at one just outside off which catches the outside edge before spooning really close to first slip
lofts this one over extra-cover to get a boundary
strides forward to meet this one as it is played to the leg side
leans forward to defend this one to the leg side
decides to go for the highly risky reverse sweep, and finds short third man straight away
bowls the knuckleball which just beats the outside edge of Mills' bat
strikes him on the right pad, but this looked to be going down the leg side
this time employs the sweep shot to get this away through fine leg for a boundary

once again goes for the reverse sweep as Mills charges down the other end, but don't you ever understimate Holder, who fires in a throw which hits the non-striker's stumps directly, as Mills is well short of his ground
